property.name: defaultResponseMsg
property.value: Failed to connect with Email Validation Service

property.name: nmsCommunicationMsg
property.value: Failed to Communicate with World Wide NMS Simulator

module-option.name: principalsQuery
module-option.value: select password from ESB_PRINCIPLES where principal_id=?

module-option.name: rolesQuery
module-option.value: select user_role, 'Roles' from ESB_ROLES where principal_id=?
